001package squidpony.squidai;
002
003import squidpony.squidgrid.FOV;
004import squidpony.squidgrid.LOS;
005import squidpony.squidgrid.Measurement;
006import squidpony.squidgrid.Radius;
007import squidpony.squidgrid.mapping.DungeonUtility;
008import squidpony.squidmath.Coord;
009import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedMap;
010import squidpony.squidmath.OrderedSet;
011
012import java.io.Serializable;
013import java.util.ArrayList;
014import java.util.Arrays;
015import java.util.Collection;
016import java.util.Queue;
017
018import static java.lang.Math.round;
019import static squidpony.squidmath.NumberTools.cos;
020import static squidpony.squidmath.NumberTools.sin;
021
022/**
023 * Beam Area of Effect that affects an slightly expanded (Elias) line from a given origin Coord out to a given length,
024 * plus an optional radius of cells around the path of the line, while respecting obstacles in its path and possibly
025 * stopping if obstructed. There are several ways to specify the BeamAOE's direction and length, including specifying
026 * an endpoint or specifying an angle in degrees and a distance to the end of the line (without the radius included).
027 * You can specify the RadiusType to Radius.DIAMOND for Manhattan distance, RADIUS.SQUARE for Chebyshev, or
028 * RADIUS.CIRCLE for Euclidean.
029 *
030 * You may want the LineAOE class instead of this. LineAOE travels point-to-point and does not restrict length, while
031 * BeamAOE travels a specific length (and may have a radius, like LineAOE) but then stops only after the travel down the
032 * length and radius has reached its end. This difference is relevant if a game has effects that have a definite
033 * area measured in a rectangle or elongated pillbox shape, such as a "20-foot-wide bolt of lightning, 100 feet long."
034 * BeamAOE is more suitable for that effect, while LineAOE may be more suitable for things like focused lasers that
035 * pass through small (likely fleshy) obstacles but stop after hitting the aimed-at target.
036 *
037 * BeamAOE will strike a small area behind the user and in the opposite direction of the target if the radius is
038 * greater than 0. This behavior may be altered in a future version.
039 *
040 * This will produce doubles for its findArea() method which are equal to 1.0.
041 *
042 * This class uses squidpony.squidmath.Elias and squidpony.squidai.DijkstraMap to create its area of effect.
043 * Created by Tommy Ettinger on 7/14/2015.
044 */
045public class BeamAOE implements AOE, Serializable {
046    private static final long serialVersionUID = 2L;
047    private Coord origin, end;
048    private int radius;
049    private int length;
050    private char[][] dungeon;
051    private DijkstraMap dijkstra;
052    private Radius rt;
053    private LOS los;
054
055    private Reach reach = new Reach(1, 1, Radius.SQUARE, AimLimit.FREE);
056
057    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, Coord end)
058    {
059        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
060        dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
061        rt = Radius.SQUARE;
062        this.origin = origin;
063        this.end = end;
064        length =(int) round(rt.radius(origin.x, origin.y, end.x, end.y));
065        reach.maxDistance = length;
066        radius = 0;
067        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
068    }
069    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, Coord end, int radius)
070    {
071        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
072        dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
073        rt = Radius.SQUARE;
074        this.origin = origin;
075        this.end = end;
076        this.radius = radius;
077        length =(int) round(rt.radius(origin.x, origin.y, end.x, end.y));
078        reach.maxDistance = length;
079        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
080    }
081    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, Coord end, int radius, Radius radiusType)
082    {
083        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
084        rt = radiusType;
085        switch (radiusType)
086        {
087            case OCTAHEDRON:
088            case DIAMOND:
089                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
090                break;
091            case CUBE:
092            case SQUARE:
093                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
094                break;
095            default:
096                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
097                break;
098        }
099        this.origin = origin;
100        this.end = end;
101        this.radius = radius;
102        length =(int) round(rt.radius(origin.x, origin.y, end.x, end.y));
103        reach.maxDistance = length;
104        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
105    }
106
107    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, double angle, int length)
108    {
109        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
110        dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
111        rt = Radius.SQUARE;
112        this.origin = origin;
113        double theta = Math.toRadians(angle);
114        end = Coord.get((int) round(cos(theta) * length) + origin.x,
115                (int) round(sin(theta) * length) + origin.y);
116        this.length = length;
117        reach.maxDistance = this.length;
118        radius = 0;
119        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
120    }
121    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, double angle, int length, int radius)
122    {
123        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
124        dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
125        rt = Radius.SQUARE;
126        this.origin = origin;
127        double theta = Math.toRadians(angle);
128        end = Coord.get((int) round(cos(theta) * length) + origin.x,
129                (int) round(sin(theta) * length) + origin.y);
130        this.radius = radius;
131        this.length = length;
132        reach.maxDistance = this.length;
133        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
134    }
135    public BeamAOE(Coord origin, double angle, int length, int radius, Radius radiusType)
136    {
137        dijkstra = new DijkstraMap();
138        rt = radiusType;
139        switch (radiusType)
140        {
141            case OCTAHEDRON:
142            case DIAMOND:
143                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
144                break;
145            case CUBE:
146            case SQUARE:
147                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
148                break;
149            default:
150                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
151                break;
152        }
153        this.origin = origin;
154        double theta = Math.toRadians(angle);
155        end = Coord.get((int) round(cos(theta) * length) + origin.x,
156                (int) round(sin(theta) * length) + origin.y);
157        this.radius = radius;
158        this.length = length;
159        reach.maxDistance = this.length;
160        los = new LOS(LOS.THICK);
161    }
162    private double[][] initDijkstra()
163    {
164        los.isReachable(dungeon, origin.x, origin.y, end.x, end.y, rt);
165        Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
166
167        dijkstra.initialize(dungeon);
168        for(Coord p : lit)
169        {
170            dijkstra.setGoal(p);
171        }
172        if(radius == 0)
173            return dijkstra.gradientMap;
174        return dijkstra.partialScan(radius, null);
175    }
176
177    @Override
178    public Coord getOrigin() {
179        return origin;
180    }
181
182    @Override
183    public void setOrigin(Coord origin) {
184        this.origin = origin;
185        dijkstra.resetMap();
186        dijkstra.clearGoals();
187    }
188
189    @Override
190    public AimLimit getLimitType() {
191        return reach.limit;
192    }
193
194    @Override
195    public int getMinRange() {
196        return reach.minDistance;
197    }
198
199    @Override
200    public int getMaxRange() {
201        return reach.maxDistance;
202    }
203
204    @Override
205    public Radius getMetric() {
206        return reach.metric;
207    }
208
209    /**
210     * Gets the same values returned by getLimitType(), getMinRange(), getMaxRange(), and getMetric() bundled into one
211     * Reach object.
212     *
213     * @return a non-null Reach object.
214     */
215    @Override
216    public Reach getReach() {
217        return reach;
218    }
219
220    @Override
221    public void setLimitType(AimLimit limitType) {
222        reach.limit = limitType;
223
224    }
225
226    @Override
227    public void setMinRange(int minRange) {
228        reach.minDistance = minRange;
229    }
230
231    @Override
232    public void setMaxRange(int maxRange) {
233        reach.maxDistance = maxRange;
234        length = maxRange;
235
236    }
237
238    @Override
239    public void setMetric(Radius metric) {
240        reach.metric = metric;
241    }
242
243    /**
244     * Sets the same values as setLimitType(), setMinRange(), setMaxRange(), and setMetric() using one Reach object.
245     *
246     * @param reach a non-null Reach object.
247     */
248    @Override
249    public void setReach(Reach reach) {
250        if(reach != null)
251            this.reach = reach;
252    }
253
254    public Coord getEnd() {
255        return end;
256    }
257
258    public void setEnd(Coord end) {
259        if (AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, end))
260        {
261            this.end = rt.extend(origin, end, length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
262        }
263
264    }
265
266    public int getRadius() {
267        return radius;
268    }
269
270    public void setRadius(int radius) {
271        this.radius = radius;
272    }
273
274    public Radius getRadiusType()
275    {
276        return rt;
277    }
278    public void setRadiusType(Radius radiusType)
279    {
280        rt = radiusType;
281        switch (radiusType)
282        {
283            case OCTAHEDRON:
284            case DIAMOND:
285                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.MANHATTAN;
286                break;
287            case CUBE:
288            case SQUARE:
289                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.CHEBYSHEV;
290                break;
291            default:
292                dijkstra.measurement = Measurement.EUCLIDEAN;
293                break;
294        }
295    }
296
297    @Override
298    public void shift(Coord aim) {
299        setEnd(aim);
300    }
301
302    @Override
303    public boolean mayContainTarget(Collection<Coord> targets) {
304        for (Coord p : targets)
305        {
306            if(rt.radius(origin.x, origin.y, p.x, p.y) + rt.radius(end.x, end.y, p.x, p.y) -
307                    rt.radius(origin.x, origin.y, end.x, end.y) <= 3.0 + radius)
308                return true;
309        }
310        return false;
311    }
312
313    @Override
314    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> targets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
315        if(targets == null)
316            return new OrderedMap<>();
317        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
318
319        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
320
321        int totalTargets = targets.size();
322        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
323
324        if(totalTargets == 0)
325            return bestPoints;
326
327        Coord[] ts = targets.toArray(new Coord[targets.size()]);
328        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
329        Coord t;
330
331        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[ts.length][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
332
333        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
334        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
335            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
336        }
337        DijkstraMap dt = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dijkstra.measurement);
338        double[][] resMap = DungeonUtility.generateResistances(dungeon);
339        Coord tempPt = Coord.get(0, 0);
340        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
341            t = rt.extend(origin, exs[i], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
342            dt.resetMap();
343            dt.clearGoals();
344            los.isReachable(resMap, origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y, rt);
345            Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
346
347
348            for(Coord p : lit)
349            {
350                dt.setGoal(p);
351            }
352            if(radius > 0)
353                dt.partialScan(radius, null);
354
355            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
356                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
357                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
358                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (dt.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
359                }
360            }
361        }
362
363        //t = rt.extend(origin, ts[0], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
364
365        for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
366            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dijkstra.measurement);
367
368            t = rt.extend(origin, ts[i], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
369            dt.resetMap();
370            dt.clearGoals();
371            los.isReachable(resMap, origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y, rt);
372            Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
373
374            for(Coord p : lit)
375            {
376                dt.setGoal(p);
377            }
378            if(radius > 0)
379                dt.partialScan(radius, null);
380
381
382            double dist = 0.0;
383            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
384                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
385                    if (dt.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR){
386                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
387                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
388                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
389                        else
390                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
391                    }
392                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
393                }
394            }
395            if(compositeMap[i][ts[i].x][ts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
396            {
397                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
398                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
399                }
400                continue;
401            }
402
403
404            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
405            dm.setGoal(ts[i]);
406            dm.scan(null, null);
407            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
408                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
409                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
410                }
411            }
412        }
413        double bestQuality = 99999 * ts.length;
414        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
415        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
416            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
417                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
418                long bits = 0;
419                for (int i = 0; i < ts.length; ++i) {
420                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
421                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
422                        bits |= 1 << i;
423                }
424                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
425                {
426                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
427
428                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
429                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
430                            ap.add(ts[i]);
431                    }
432
433                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
434                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
435                        bestPoints.clear();
436                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
437                    }
438                }
439                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
440                {
441                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
442
443                    for (int i = 0; i < ts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
444                        if((bits & (1 << i)) != 0)
445                            ap.add(ts[i]);
446                    }
447
448                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
449                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
450                    }
451                }
452            }
453        }
454
455        return bestPoints;
456    }
457
458    @Override
459    public OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> idealLocations(Collection<Coord> priorityTargets, Collection<Coord> lesserTargets, Collection<Coord> requiredExclusions) {
460        if(priorityTargets == null)
461            return idealLocations(lesserTargets, requiredExclusions);
462        if(requiredExclusions == null) requiredExclusions = new OrderedSet<>();
463
464        //requiredExclusions.remove(origin);
465        int totalTargets = priorityTargets.size() + lesserTargets.size();
466        OrderedMap<Coord, ArrayList<Coord>> bestPoints = new OrderedMap<>(totalTargets * 8);
467
468        if(totalTargets == 0)
469            return bestPoints;
470
471        Coord[] pts = priorityTargets.toArray(new Coord[priorityTargets.size()]);
472        Coord[] lts = lesserTargets.toArray(new Coord[lesserTargets.size()]);
473        Coord[] exs = requiredExclusions.toArray(new Coord[requiredExclusions.size()]);
474        Coord t;// = rt.extend(origin, exs[0], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
475
476        double[][][] compositeMap = new double[totalTargets][dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
477
478        char[][] dungeonCopy = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length],
479                dungeonPriorities = new char[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
480        for (int i = 0; i < dungeon.length; i++) {
481            System.arraycopy(dungeon[i], 0, dungeonCopy[i], 0, dungeon[i].length);
482            Arrays.fill(dungeonPriorities[i], '#');
483        }
484        DijkstraMap dt = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dijkstra.measurement);
485        double[][] resMap = DungeonUtility.generateResistances(dungeon);
486        Coord tempPt = Coord.get(0, 0);
487        for (int i = 0; i < exs.length; ++i) {
488            t = rt.extend(origin, exs[i], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
489            dt.resetMap();
490            dt.clearGoals();
491            los.isReachable(resMap, origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y, rt);
492            Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
493
494            for(Coord p : lit)
495            {
496                dt.setGoal(p);
497            }
498            if(radius > 0)
499                dt.partialScan(radius, null);
500
501            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
502                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
503                    tempPt = Coord.get(x, y);
504                    dungeonCopy[x][y] = (dt.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  || !AreaUtils.verifyReach(reach, origin, tempPt)) ? '!' : dungeonCopy[x][y];
505                }
506            }
507        }
508
509        t = rt.extend(origin, pts[0], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
510
511        for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
512            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dijkstra.measurement);
513
514            t = rt.extend(origin, pts[i], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
515            dt.resetMap();
516            dt.clearGoals();
517            los.isReachable(resMap, origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y, rt);
518            Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
519
520            for(Coord p : lit)
521            {
522                dt.setGoal(p);
523            }
524            if(radius > 0)
525                dt.partialScan(radius, null);
526
527
528            double dist = 0.0;
529            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
530                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
531                    if (dt.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR){
532                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
533                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius) {
534                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
535                            dungeonPriorities[x][y] = dungeon[x][y];
536                        }
537                        else
538                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
539                    }
540                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
541                }
542            }
543            if(compositeMap[i][pts[i].x][pts[i].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
544            {
545                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
546                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 399999.0);
547                }
548                continue;
549            }
550
551
552            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
553            dm.setGoal(pts[i]);
554            dm.scan(null, null);
555            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
556                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
557                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 399999.0;
558                }
559            }
560            dm.resetMap();
561            dm.clearGoals();
562        }
563
564        t = rt.extend(origin, lts[0], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
565
566        for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
567            DijkstraMap dm = new DijkstraMap(dungeon, dijkstra.measurement);
568
569            t = rt.extend(origin, lts[i - pts.length], length, false, dungeon.length, dungeon[0].length);
570            dt.resetMap();
571            dt.clearGoals();
572            los.isReachable(resMap, origin.x, origin.y, t.x, t.y, rt);
573            Queue<Coord> lit = los.getLastPath();
574
575            for(Coord p : lit)
576            {
577                dt.setGoal(p);
578            }
579            if(radius > 0)
580                dt.partialScan(radius, null);
581
582
583            double dist = 0.0;
584            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
585                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
586                    if (dt.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR){
587                        dist = reach.metric.radius(origin.x, origin.y, x, y);
588                        if(dist <= reach.maxDistance + radius && dist >= reach.minDistance - radius)
589                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = dm.physicalMap[x][y];
590                        else
591                            compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
592                    }
593                    else compositeMap[i][x][y] = DijkstraMap.WALL;
594                }
595            }
596            if(compositeMap[i][lts[i - pts.length].x][lts[i - pts.length].y] > DijkstraMap.FLOOR)
597            {
598                for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++)
599                {
600                    Arrays.fill(compositeMap[i][x], 99999.0);
601                }
602                continue;
603            }
604
605
606            dm.initialize(compositeMap[i]);
607            dm.setGoal(lts[i - pts.length]);
608            dm.scan(null, null);
609            for (int x = 0; x < dungeon.length; x++) {
610                for (int y = 0; y < dungeon[x].length; y++) {
611                    compositeMap[i][x][y] = (dm.gradientMap[x][y] < DijkstraMap.FLOOR  && dungeonCopy[x][y] != '!' && dungeonPriorities[x][y] != '#') ? dm.gradientMap[x][y] : 99999.0;
612                }
613            }
614            dm.resetMap();
615            dm.clearGoals();
616        }
617        double bestQuality = 99999 * lts.length + 399999 * pts.length;
618        double[][] qualityMap = new double[dungeon.length][dungeon[0].length];
619        for (int x = 0; x < qualityMap.length; x++) {
620            for (int y = 0; y < qualityMap[x].length; y++) {
621                qualityMap[x][y] = 0.0;
622                long pbits = 0, lbits = 0;
623                for (int i = 0; i < pts.length; ++i) {
624                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
625                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 399999.0 && i < 63)
626                        pbits |= 1 << i;
627                }
628                for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets; ++i) {
629                    qualityMap[x][y] += compositeMap[i][x][y];
630                    if(compositeMap[i][x][y] < 99999.0 && i < 63)
631                        lbits |= 1 << i;
632                }
633                if(qualityMap[x][y] < bestQuality)
634                {
635                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
636
637                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
638                        if((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
639                            ap.add(pts[i]);
640                    }
641                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
642                        if((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
643                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
644                    }
645
646                    if(ap.size() > 0) {
647                        bestQuality = qualityMap[x][y];
648                        bestPoints.clear();
649                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
650                    }
651                }
652                else if(qualityMap[x][y] == bestQuality)
653                {
654                    ArrayList<Coord> ap = new ArrayList<>();
655
656                    for (int i = 0; i < pts.length && i < 63; ++i) {
657                        if ((pbits & (1 << i)) != 0) {
658                            ap.add(pts[i]);
659                            ap.add(pts[i]);
660                            ap.add(pts[i]);
661                            ap.add(pts[i]);
662                        }
663                    }
664                    for (int i = pts.length; i < totalTargets && i < 63; ++i) {
665                        if((lbits & (1 << i)) != 0)
666                            ap.add(lts[i - pts.length]);
667                    }
668
669                    if (ap.size() > 0) {
670                        bestPoints.put(Coord.get(x, y), ap);
671                    }
672                }
673            }
674        }
675
676        return bestPoints;
677    }
678

682            int totalTargets = targets.size() + 1;
683            int volume = (int)(rt.radius(1, 1, dungeon.length - 2, dungeon[0].length - 2) * radius * 2.1);

744    */
745    @Override
746    public void setMap(char[][] map) {
747        dungeon = map;
748        end = rt.extend(origin, end, length, false, map.length, map[0].length);
749        dijkstra.resetMap();
750        dijkstra.clearGoals();
751    }
752
753    @Override
754    public OrderedMap<Coord, Double> findArea() {
755        double[][] dmap = initDijkstra();
756        dmap[origin.x][origin.y] = DijkstraMap.DARK;
757        dijkstra.resetMap();
758        dijkstra.clearGoals();
759        return AreaUtils.dijkstraToHashMap(dmap);
760    }
761
762    /**
763     * Unused because FOVCache rarely provides a speed boost and usually does the opposite. The implementation for this
764     * method should be a no-op.
765     * @param cache an FOV that could be an FOVCache for the current level; can be null to stop using the cache
766     * @deprecated AOE doesn't really benefit from using an FOVCache
767     */
768    @Override
769    @Deprecated
770    public void setCache(FOV cache) {
771    }
772
773}
